title: Binance $100B Wipeout: Bitcoin Crashes Below $105K as Trump Claims “Never Met” Pardoned CZ
description: November 4, 2025 – The crypto market has launched November with a boom or a bang, or more precisely, a thud, with the major assets such as Bitcoin and Ethereum crashing amidst the mounting economic tensions in the world.
